title: We'll Get Our Happy Ending
alternative_title: Dorama ni Naranai Bokura no Hanashi; ドラマにならないWらの; ; 无法变得戏剧性的我们
status: Dorama ni Naranai Bokura no Hanashi; ドラマにならないWらの; ; 无法变得戏剧性的我们
description:
Description :
        Soma Ishii's a college freshman who stands out for all the right reasons.The coming-out statement he makes during the welcome party for the new students leaves everyone stunned. Wataru Hayashishita, who goes both ways, was secretly hoping he'd say something like that, so he approaches Soma looking to get to know him better, but... Soma coldly cuts him off and crushes his hopes.Some time later, Wataru meets Soma at a party again, but something's off about him...In this story about young love, we see what happens when two college students still pining for their ex-boyfriends when they first meet, keep bumping into each other.+
